caption: Icelandic Aurora
alt: Vibrant green aurora borealis dancing over the mountains of Iceland.

caption: Aurora Australis from ISS
alt: The Southern Lights glowing over the Earth's horizon, seen from the International Space Station.

caption: Violet Northern Lights
alt: Rare purple and pink hues in the aurora borealis over a dark forest.

caption: Lake Reflection
alt: A stunning green aurora reflected perfectly in the calm water of a northern lake.

caption: Dancing Light Curtains
alt: Bright green curtains of the aurora borealis moving across the starry night sky.

caption: Lights over Norway
alt: The Northern Lights illuminating the sky above a coastal town in Norway.
